si.title: යාපනයේ අනතුරපුද්ගලයින් 4 දෙනෙක් තුවාල ලැබූහ
body_lines: යාපනයේ සවුවාචෙරි සම්පත් රෝහල අසල A9 මාර්ගයේ ත්රිරෝද රථයක් ගැටීමෙන් තිදෙනෙකු තුවාල ලබා තිබේ.
බර වාහනය එය පෙරළීමට උත්සාහ කළ පරිදි, තිදෙනා එය ගැටී ඇත.
සිද්ධියෙන් තුවාල ලැබූ ත්රිරෝද රථ රියදුරු සහ සංචාරකයින් තිදෙනා චවාකච්චේරි සම්පත් රෝහලට ඇතුළත් කර තිබේ.

en.title: Accident in Jaffna4 people injured
body_lines: Four people were injured when a three -wheeler collided with a heavy crash on the A9 road near the Jaffna Sawakcheri Resource Hospital.
As the heavy vehicle tried to turn it behind, the three -wheeler collided with it.
The three -wheeler driver and the three travelers who were injured in the incident have been admitted to Chavakachcheri Resource Hospital.

summary_lines: In Jaffna, four people were hurt in a collision between a three-wheeler and a heavy vehicle on the A9 road near the Jaffna Sawakcheri Resource Hospital. The accident occurred as the heavy vehicle attempted a U-turn. The victims, including the driver and passengers of the three-wheeler, were taken to Chavakachcheri Resource Hospital for treatment.
